thread.title: Adobe Integrates eLearning Brothers Templates into Captivate 9
thread.title_full: Adobe Integrates eLearning Brothers Templates into Captivate 9

title: Adobe Integrates eLearning Brothers Templates into Captivate 9
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 20, 2015, 00:36 BST - UK Markets open in 7 hrs 24 mins Adobe Integrates eLearning Brothers Templates into Captivate 9 Press Release : eLearning Brothers – 2 hours 39 minutes ago Print 
AMERICAN FORK, Utah--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- 
eLearning Brothers is now integrated into today’s release of the new Adobe Captivate 9 eLearning authoring software. Adobe has integrated eLearning Brothers Templates , eLearning Games and Quizzes , Cutout People Libraries , and eLearning Course Starters directly into Adobe Captivate 9 . This integration gives Captivate 9 developers instant access to over 25,000 templates directly within the software. eLearning Brothers Templates are now included in the purchase price of Captivate 9, giving developers the ability to create engaging, interactive, and inspiring courses. This Smart News Release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150819006249/en/ 
“Instructional designers and eLearning developers now have full access to the Adobe Captivate Templates and Cutout People library by eLearning Brothers at no additional cost. They can download templates directly within the Captivate 9 interface which are permanently stored on the user's computer to create eLearning awesomeness,” said Curtis Morley, President of eLearning Brothers. 
Along with the eLearning Brothers template library, Adobe Captivate 9 now includes Knowledge Check Questions, SVG Support, Multistate Objects, In-Product LMS Preview, Interactive Slideshows, and Responsive Motion Effects (without programming). 
“Captivate 9 users will also have a unique set of eLearning Brothers templates specifically designed for this release with fresh visuals and elements that capitalize on the newest features, such as: ‘Multistate Objects’, the new user interface, and all five of the mobile responsive breakpoint views,” said Andrew Scivally, Co-Founder of eLearning Brothers. 
“We chose eLearning Brothers as our asset partner because we believe they have the most comprehensive offering out there for assets. Our users will be able to create content much faster. This is what Rapid eLearning development really looks like,” said Akshay Bharadwaj, Senior Product Manager - Adobe Captivate. 
For further details: elearningbrothers.com/adobe-integrates-elearning-brothers-templates-captivate-9 | http://www.Adobe.com/products/captivate.html?sdid=KTVHL 
About eLearning Brothers 
eLearning Brothers provides the planet’s largest, most interactive library of learning assets for rapid eLearning development. eLearning Brothers was founded in 2009 by two brothers who recognized the need to enable Awesome eLearning development with great-looking templates.
